resources.string: "This is a simple BlackJack game. The player1 pick cards first until he gets the score he wants, then player 2 start picking card. if they all have score that under 21. the player who has bigger score wins.if one of the player gets the score over 21, another player wins."

"This is a simple BlackJack game. The player1 pick cards first until he gets the score he wants, then player 2 start picking card. if they all have score that under 21. the player who has bigger score wins.if one of the player gets the score over 21, another player wins."
